column1: Common Bond Bistro & Bakery - Montrose////Love this place -- folks who actually know how to pull an espresso shot properly and make one of the best lattes in town
column3: make this one of my favorite spots to meet up with friends.  The lunch menu is also interesting.  Parking
column5: can be a challenge but it's worth at and afterwards
column6: I enjoy going to the local goods shop next door.
